'Shock' is an unincorporated community in Gilmer County, West Virginia, United
States. Shock is southwest of Glenville, along the Right Fork Steer Creek. Shock has a post office with ZIP code 26638. [http://www.zipinfo.com/cgi-
local/zipsrch.exe?cnty=cnty&zip=26638&Go=Go ZIP Code Lookup]
categories: Populated places in Gilmer County, West Virginia
